Protocol messages for the Assets subsystem 
(0x4000-0x4FFF).

See [[id:A7B3C9D2-E5F1-4A8B-9C6D-3E2F1A0B8C7D][Protocol Reference]] for the complete protocol documentation.

| ID | Name | Description |

| 0x4005 | list_images_response | Response containing metadata for all available ima... |

* Message Details

** get_images_request (0x4002)

Request to retrieve images by their IDs.  Supports batched retrieval with a maximum of MAX_IMAGES_PER_REQUEST (100) IDs.

*** Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------+------+-------------|
| image_ids | ~std::vector<std::string>~ |  |

** get_images_response (0x4003)

Response containing requested images.

*** Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------+------+-------------|
| images | ~std::vector<domain::image>~ |  |

** list_images_request (0x4004)

Request to list all available images.  Returns metadata for all images without the SVG data (to reduce payload size).

** list_images_response (0x4005)

Response containing metadata for all available images.

*** Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------+------+-------------|
| images | ~std::vector<image_info>~ |  |
